source_sentence: 第六十七(之七)　『杵』(空解脫起聲聞乘終)『摧』(我有情起聲聞乘終)結經『滅』(色起至聲聞乘)『煩』非常非樂(同色起並聲聞乘終)非我(色起內空終)。
translation: Sixty-seventh (no. 7): 'Pounder' (the end of the śrāvaka vehicle arising from the liberation of emptiness), 'destruction' (the end of the śrāvaka vehicle arising from self and sentient beings), 'cessation' (the end of the śrāvaka vehicle arising from form), 'affliction' (the end of the śrāvaka vehicle arising from the same form), 'non-enjoyment' (the end of the śrāvaka vehicle arising from form), and 'non-self' (the end of internal emptiness arising from form).

source_sentence: 第六十八(之八)　『煩』非我(布施起聲聞終)寂靜　遠離　空　無相　無願　善　無罪　無漏(並色起俱聲聞乘終)無染(色起至內空終)。
translation: 68(eighth) 'Afflictions' are not self (arising from generosity and ending with the direct disciples), tranquil, isolated, empty, signless, wishless, good, sinless, uncontaminated (arising from form and ending with the direct disciples), and undefiled (arising from form and ending with internal emptiness).

source_sentence: 第六十九(之九)　『煩』無染(布施起聲聞終)清淨　出世間無為(並色起俱聲聞乘終)『惱』(從色起至無為法終)『山』(色起至聲聞終)『震』(色起至無相解脫終)。
translation: 69(ninth) 'Afflictions' are undefiled (arising from generosity and ending with the śrāvaka vehicle), pure, transcendent, and uncontaminated (arising from form and ending with the śrāvaka vehicle), 'afflictions' (arising from form to the end of the teaching of nothingness), 'mountains' (arising from form to the end of the śrāvaka path), and 'trembling' (arising from form to the end of liberation through signlessness).

source_sentence: 第七十(之十)　『震』(五眼起聲聞終)『吼』(般若起聲聞終)結改品『師』(二回並色起陀羅尼終)『子』(色起不生至內空經)。
translation: The seventieth (of ten) class 'Zhen' (from the rise of the five eyes to the end of the śrāvaka path) 'Roar' (from the rise of the prajñāpāramitā to the end of the śrāvaka path) 'Teacher' (from the end of the dhāraṇī for the parallel rise of form) 'Son' (from the rise of form to the end of the sutra on internal emptiness).

source_sentence: 〔荒〕第七十一(之二)　『子』(不生布施起陀羅尼終)不滅(色起陀羅尼終)『聲』(色起至陀羅終)『碎』(色起至陀羅終)正經『裂』(色起至陀羅終)正經『野』(色起至陀羅終)。
translation: The [barren] seventy-first (bis) class 'Son' (end of the dhāraṇī arising from the giving of unborn things) 'Amoghasiddhi' (end of the dhāraṇī arising from form) 'Sound' (end of the dhāraṇī arising from form) 'Shatter' (end of the dhāraṇī arising from form) 'Shatter' (end of the dhāraṇī arising from form) 'Correct Sutra' (end of the dhāraṇī arising from form) 'Wild' (end of the dhāraṇī arising from form) 'Correct Sutra' (end of the dhāraṇī arising from form).

source_sentence: 第七十二(之三)　『干』(色起至陀羅尼終)。
translation: The seventy-second (ter) 'Dry' (from the arising of form to the end of the dhāraṇī).

source_sentence: 第七十三(之四)　『膽』(不生不滅二番俱色起並至陀羅尼終)『釋』(色起陀羅尼終)。
translation: The 73rd (4th) 'Gall' (the twofold co-arising of form that neither arises nor ceases and which reaches the end of the dhāraṇī) and 'Explanation' (the end of the dhāraṇī that arises from form).

source_sentence: 大般若波羅蜜多經關法卷第二
translation: Mahāprajñāpāramitā-sūtra-paripṛcchā(sūtra), Guanfa vol. 2
